name: VoidSweeper
description:
Welcome to Voidsweeper

This is a game made for a game jam by 3 people in less than 48 hours.

This is like minesweeper, only without the grid, or numbers, in space.

Can you clear the grid without stumbling in a black hole, never to return?

Scout bullets get attracted by the black holes, use them to pinpoint black hole locations, then fire a killer bullet, that doesn't get affected and can destroy black holes if aimed straight at the center.

Be sure to share your PB in the sticky thread.
